author: Dante Wilson
comment: Don't like the price hikes u guys have my usual $15 trip now is usually about $25-$30 I know gas prices ain't rising that much & I've been a loyal customer for a couple of yrs u guys need to work on a discount plan for frequent customers

I loved lyft for the fair prices but I have to say, charging me 63 dollars for what is usually a 17 dollar ride is not ok, prime time or not, the most I've paid during prime time for an 11 mile ride to pick my kids up from school is always up to 25 dollars.  I don't care what you're spin on that price spike was but now I'm thinking of going over to uber and will be letting folks know. 🤷🏻‍♀️

author: Siren R
comment: I keep getting money taking out of my account yet tells there is an issue with my payment information, I get nothing driver but yet you are constantly taking my money and I have no way of contacting anyone, this is very inconvenient, I have court and no way to get there because all you seem to want to do. Is take my money!! I would like someone to get in contact with me ASAP!

author: Daveda Hudson
comment: I use this app twice a day and when it comes to getting to work it's like trying to play the lotto. This morning a driver cancelled as he pulled up before I could even go down the elevator. You can't write and complain about things that though to customer service. I'm so irritated with Lyft

author: Tri Fecta
comment: They have no way of telling them they are wrong on their pricing. They added stops and debits on my card i was unaware of several times and i was never able to use my promo codes. No CS at all zero.

author: lipa akter
comment: Lyft stole my money. When i called a lyft, i cancelled it immediately. However i was charged anyway. I cancelled it way before it was 4 minutes. But i was still charged. I filed a complaint to lyft but i still didnt get my money back. This is very ridiculous.

author: jrzj
comment: The app used to be good, however, now it barely works. Whenever I open it the app automatically schedules my ride later for an hour plus. It's come to the point where I have to clear the cache or reinstall the app for it to work properly. When I do get a ride the drivers even complain about how bad the app is on their end.

author: Alexis Smith
comment: I was using Lyft to get to work and it told me my ride would be $21 and change. I chose the card that I wanted and then hit confirm ride but when I checked the receipt later it showed that I had played 31.51 I have been trying to contact someone about getting this adjusted for two days but the get help robot is unhelpful and there doesn't seem to be anyway to talk to a real person.

My phone was stolen by a lyft driver today and despite contracting lyft they did nothing to help. This was in Los Angeles by a driver named Katherine driving a Mazda speed 3 CA license plate 6lgl989. The scumbag even had the nerve to answer my phone yet not return it. Lyft made no contact and this has been a nightmare. I intended to file a police report tomorrow.

author: Jim Lewis
comment: I actually like Lyft better than uber. But this app freakin SUCKS! Always gets hung up, doesn't update where I am, how far away my ride is, doesn't notify me to tip. Just annoying in so many ways. I'm unfortunately going back to uber.

author: Kyle Grysban
comment: The drivers in my area stink, never speak English and have no sense of direction. And the fact I have to pay a $5 fee for incompetence each time is ridiculous. But this is just my experience, the app itself is great and convenient. I just wish they had a better hiring system.

author: Frances Janis
comment: App gave an inaccurate location where I was at. I had to contact my driver , to let him know my location.  I dont fault the driver.  I was 8 mins driving distance to my destination which I put in. When he picked me up he went had some other destination point thus I was late.  Estimated fee was $18.00 for a 5 min ride. The app then asked for a tip and review of some driver i never had.  Horrible. Horrible first time experience.

author: Timothy Cunningham
comment: I'm overwhelmed with the courtesy of the Lyft drivers. They are always on time. There is no wait time. The drivers are well-mannered and friendly. It's like riding with family or a close friend. They are opened to engaging conversation. I give Lyft five stars.

author: Ian Lewis
comment: Beef up the presence. Youre way better then uber. Get on the flying car bandwagon, get funding from corrupt overseas tycoons. Dont let them win lol. Happy i switched to Lyft

author: Ilia Ovsiannikov
comment: Usually it works well, but I had a situation where driver did *not* pick me up, but app indicated ride has started and I'm on the way home. I could see "myself" zooming away on the Lyft app's map. Then I searched for a  cancel ride button - there isn't one, couldn't find. So I searched for Lyft support phone - there isn't one either I could find. Eventually I found in the depths of app help a little contact form. This is not good enough and is a bad experience as far as I am concerned.

author: Sherita Mines
comment: It's becoming a little too pricey here in the Richmond Virginia area. My 7-12 minute ride to work went from $7 to $13

author: A Smith
comment: The app is fine but.Lyft could do a ton more for existing customers absolutely Zero unless u hook them to more people then its hardly anything and  I personally have had to use everyday for 6 months usually twice a day and never got a loyalty discount or anything. Once i signed up and couple dollars off per ride was up  ive had to been a  free referal  to lyft so they spend less and make more .... . HEY LYFT Take care of ur loyal People .. Lyft we do for u why not  Return to us existings... we'd probably refer more friends .

author: Eric Garcia
comment: First few months were great but since the beginning of February, I can never get a cheap ride. Everytime I try now I get surge pricing. I use to pay 6.50 to 8 but now it's 20+ dollars for the same trip. I live in a major city so there should be more drivers available. I switched to uber and now I'm getting a great deal without the SURGE PRICING

author: Gaby Hui
comment: The driver said he'd get me from very far away. And then proceeded to pick up other passengers while I waited 20 minutes. Why connect me when I have to wait that long and I have to pay a penalty to cancel? That's not right.

author: Thomas Sutherland
comment: I absolutely love using this app, but as much as as much good as it does (which is a lot and I'm very thankful for the Good it does me) there's a lot of improvements that could be made. For instance text messaging the passengers, picking a preferred driver the customer would like to use for their next lyft ride experience, voice commands, and the Google maps adaptation should be implemented better with more landmarks on the map for a better reference point on yours and the passengers location!

author: Rony Islam
comment: It's too expensive. Uber costs 9.48 from work to home and Lyft charges me $14!!!! What's the point of lyft?

author: Kyle Wilderson
comment: So, I use Lyft quite often because Uber won't take my AMEX card.. 9/10 times the price is the same but every once in a while the price is like triple for no apparent reason.

author: Joshua Jones
comment: Just got the app & setup payment info. Unable to split fare. Text message brings to app with no split fare pop-up. Nothing in notifications or history.   Drivers & service are great. App has issues.

author: Lyrical Blist
comment: This app freezes all the time. When it's not freezing it constantly shows  "updating your location".

author: Kimshay Dalton
comment: I don't like this Lyft this morning cost me 33 Dollar get to school c'mon now what happen to 11 dollar u know what whatever you do don't use Lyft to be rider cuz Uber better is my 1st time be a rider so try it

Ive never had a problem with lift until this day until this day I would have recommended it to anyone as a cheaper way to get around alternative to a cab but after today NO NEVER again when I needed lift the most I couldn't get one. Now I would understand if it was a last minute thing and there was nothing lift could do as the time frame was limited but NOOOOOO this was a scheduled ride for the next day I set it up got the locked in rate and was assured I'd have a driver coming to get me for the set time (as this was an emergency to get to the airport to get to another state to see my dying uncle) so of course everything was set up so things would run smoothly but when it came time for the lift driver to show up I get a notification saying that lift is just now looking for a driver WHAT!! but of course no drivers are available because it was early in the morning (another reason I decided to schedule a ride) ridiculous. To anyone who works at lift I hope you see this as I would never wish this to happen to anyone else!!

author: Cynthia Spurling
comment: As far as I can tell it tempt you with a discount coupon then doesn't even work at all. They are just collecting you information to use later.

author: Vienz Sein
comment: Hi. I have a problem activating the app, it kept asking for 6 digit code where only 4 digit code was sent to my phone. Pls fix this problem.

reply.author: Lyft, Inc.
reply.content: Hey Vienz, we can help with this! Can you please contact our Support Team? They can be contacted at http://lft.to/review_help. If for any reason you do not receive a reply, feel free to edit this review with your ticket number so we can expedite this. Thank you for letting us know!

author: Cole Ogden
comment: horrible, when I press pick me up from location. it better set a pin where I choose to get picked up from. won't use this app, EVER again

author: Zakop999
comment: Refuses to take payment from Navy federal credit union. Not only mine but several other buddies of mine. How do they get away with doing this to service members?

author: Ben Chacko
comment: Horrible ETA's. It constantly jumps around, I assume to adjust to the vehicle speed, but that never gives an accurate estimate.

author: John P
comment: Ok but setting up a new account with PayPal does not work so it's an immediate turnoff. You'd think they'd test.

reply.author: Lyft, Inc.
reply.content: Hey John, we can help with adding your PayPal account! Can you please contact our Support Team? They can be contacted at http://lft.to/review_help. If for any reason you do not receive a reply, feel free to edit this review with your ticket number so we can expedite this. Thank you for letting us know!

author: Bianca Moore
comment: I used this app to pick my son up from school. Both drivers cancelled without notice and I was still charged. My son was left at school for more than 2 hours. I WILL BE FILING AGAINST LYFT!!!!!!!

author: Xao Teng
comment: Nice like star light... I hate that I would just walk without it. :'-(

author: Kay Win
comment: I love Lyft, but now that prices have gone up I have had to switch to uber which is noe the cheapest option for me to get to and from work. I would much rather use lyft, but because of the new price for a short trip I won't be using it again.

author: andrea cramer
comment: I would give it 5 stars however i think that going from a normal 13-16 dollar ride 5 minutes later making it 76 dollars is ridiculous id rather go into work late than spend that type of money highway robbery..

author: Lowan Thomas
comment: Great app to have arrival times r great, and pick up times r also great, good friendly drivers.

author: Kassia Tharpe
comment: The app doesn't allow me to pre schedule my rides. For example i don't have to be anywhere til 1pm but its only letting me schedule the time for right NOE which is not wanting to do. Fix this and I'll increase my rating

reply.author: Lyft, Inc.
reply.content: Hey Kassia, we can help with this! Can you please contact our Support Team? They can be contacted at http://lft.to/review_help. If for any reason you do not receive a reply, feel free to edit this review with your ticket number so we can expedite this. Thank you for letting us know!

author: Cheryl Barron
comment: Very disappointed. There are no Lyft cars that come to where I live. This blows-I really need rides as I dont drive and city bus does not run on weekends. Deleting app

author: Kyle Smith
comment: Well my friend and I were trying to split a payment and it charged us both the full price of the ride. This is bs even after my friend had called about the issue
